article_title: SOAR initiative finds concern in Eastern Kentucky about health effects of surface mining
article_text: Possible links between health problems and mountaintop mining in Eastern Kentucky emerged as a key concern of people attending sessions aimed at coming up with ideas to improve the economy and quality of life in the region, according to the dentist who chaired the sessions.

article_metadata.news-keywords: soar, appalachian, poverty, mining, mountaintop, removal, health
